"Break down Biol Meduna piece by piece!":
"Professor, as I want to become an outstanding and
good ARKS member, allow me to ask you questions!
I'd like you to teach me how to break down the Biol
Meduna piece by piece at the bottom of the ocean!
I have heard that by attacking the backside and the
tail, you will be able to break it! Please help me!

*Defeat a Lv.60 or higher Biol Meduna and it
is defeated after its backside and tail are destroyed"
"ビオル・メデューナの部位破壊を！"

"先生、今回もよろしくお願いします！
自分、立派なアークスになりたいので
質問させてください！
海底のビオル・メデューナの部位破壊に
ついて教えていただきたいです！
尻尾を攻撃すれば破壊できると聞きましたが
自分、よくわかりません。
是非お願いします！
※Lv.60以上のビオル・メデューナの
尻尾を破壊してから撃破する"
